name: Crisantemo
description:
Crisantemo is a short 3D platformer made for our final degree project between 2017 and 2018. In this etheral world you will use the hidden power of the vegetation in order to travel through it.

CONTROLS

 WASD to move.

Space to jump.

Left click to interact with the flowers.

Made by:

  • Programmer:David Rogel
  • Artists: Nuria Calzada, Adrian Moreno, Carlos Pardo & Juan Fernandez
  • Desginers:Javier Cirujano  &  Jorge Monedero (That's me!) 
  • Producer: Nuria Calzada,
